topicv3: Water Safety Plans m1326749 2007,Water Supply and Sanitation m1327240 1199,Water Treatment m1326992 2008,Water Law m1327600 1021,Water Supply m1326961 138

abstracts.cdata!:
Starting small, 3 cities in northern
            Karnataka demonstrated that a well-operated water supply
            company could deliver affordable, reliable service in an
            urban area. More than 175,000 individuals are benefiting
            from water supplied directly to their homes, even surprising
            skeptics with evidence that 20 percent less water is being
            used than before. What had been a burden to collect,
            primarily by the women in the household, was not a
            convenient commodity of life-sustaining importance.
